revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Homehub2a-cover.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = BT Home Hub 2.0 Type A |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = BT_Home_Hub_2.0A |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = BT |model = Home Hub |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = 2.0 |subrevision = A |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/24/2012 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/BT_Home_Hub_2.0A |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, dsl modem, analog phone gateway |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM6358; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = BMIPS4350 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 300 <!-- 300 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S29GL128N90TFIR2; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY5DU121622DTP; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM5325E; |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = 00:22:69
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = CFE;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Mini PCI |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 15 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = ADSL2+, DECT, |addchip = Programmble Wideband SLIC/Codec;Silicon Labs;Si3216-FM;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = BTHomeHub2-XXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^BTHomeHub2-[A-Z0-9]{4}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 11/2009 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Broadcom BCM94321MP |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4321;BCM4321L; |rad1chip2 = Broadcom;BCM2055; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|BT Home Hub}} *[https://openwrt.org/toh/bt/homehub_v2a ''BT HomeHub 2.0 Type A'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM6358KFBG @300MHz (BMIPS4350 V1.0) :RAM: ''SK hynix'' HY5DU121622DTP or ''Samsung'' K4H511638D :WLAN: [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM94322MP2D BCM94322MP2D] 2T2R 802.11bgn (2.4GHz) *[https://gadgetcat.wordpress.com/2011/02/19/home-hub-3-disassembly/ ''Home Hub 2.0A/3.0A Disassembly'' on '''GadgetCat'''] (PCB images) :which would indicate the device uses a BCM4321 wireless module :(''[[Broadcom]]'' BCM94321MP3C2) w/ a 00:22:69 OUI (''[[Foxconn]]'') :[http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM94321MP BCM94321MP] or [[Broadcom BCM94322MP2D|BCM94322MP2D]] ??
The default SSID pattern for this device appears to be '''BTHomeHub2-''' :followed by 4 random upper-case letters or numbers.
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|broadcomwifi}} {{OpenWrtNotice|BCM63xxDSL}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/bt/bt_homehub_2a |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/bt/homehub_v2a |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=51348 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 15.05 |current_supported_version = 23.05.0 |unsupportedfuncntions = [https://openwrt.org/unsupported/dect DECT], [https://openwrt.org/unsupported/dsl_modem DSL modem] |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
